description:
Some campsites have plenty of trees, for others, this lightweight frame lets you sleep or lounge anywhere you desire.

  • Aluminum tubing with adjustable arms handles most hammocks
  • Sleeps 1 person, holds up to 2 people in lounge mode
  • Holds up to 181kg
  • Includes padded travel bag
name: Kammok Swiftlet Portable Hammock Stand
